application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Sycamore. Approx 18m in Height with an 8m  Lateral spread.Proposed Works: Lift to crown break only.height and lateral spread will remain unchanged as only the epicormic growth up to crown break will be removedT2 - Lime. Approx 20m height with an 8m lateral spread. Proposed Works: Lift to crown break only.height and lateral spread will remain unchanged as only the epicormic growth up to crown break will be removedT3 - Horse Chestnut. Approx 16m in height with an 8m lateral spread.Proposed Works: Lift to crown break only.height and lateral spread will remain unchanged as only the epicormic growth up to crown break will be removedT4 -  Sycamore. Approx 16 m in Height with a 6m  Lateral spread.Proposed Works: Lift to crown break only.height and lateral spread will remain unchanged as only the epicormic growth up to crown break will be removedT5 - Conifer. 8m Height, 4M lateral spread.Proposed works: Remove and grind stump. Tree suppressed by large sycamore, poor form and low amenity value. T6 Walnut. 8m Height, 5M lateral spread.Proposed Works: Remove deadwood only. height and lateral spread will remain unchanged as we are removing the deadwood onlyT7 Conifer. 11m Height, 5M lateral spread. Proposed works: Lift lower branches to 4m. T8 Holly. 4m Height, 2m lateral spread.Proposed works: Remove and grind stump. Tree suppressed by large sycamore, poor form and low amenity value. All growth on one side only.
